author: Brian Turner
method: In a small saucepan heat the butter.  Add the peach and tomato and cook for 2-3 minutes or until they start to soften. Add the white wine vinegar, white wine and honey and cook rapidly for a further five minutes. The chutney is ready, once the fruits have broken down slightly and the liquid has been reduced.
ingredients: 1 tbsp butter,  Â½ peach, peeled and chopped,  1 tomato, deseeded and chopped,  1 shallot, finely chopped,  2 tbsp white wine vinegar,  1 tbsp white wine,  1 tbsp honey
